sentences.en: Daguerre: French artist and inventor of the daguerreotype process for obtaining positive photographic prints.
sentences.cn: 达盖尔: 法国艺术家和发明家,发明了银版摄影术,能洗出照片的正画.

sentences.en: French artist and inventor of the daguerreotype process for obtaining positive photographic prints.
sentences.cn: 达盖尔,路易斯·雅克·曼德1789-1851法国艺术家和发明家,发明了银版摄影术,能洗出照片的正画来.

sentences.en: Louis-Jacques-Mande Daguerre (November 18, 1787 � July 10, 1851) was a French artist and chemist, recognized for his invention of the daguerreotype process of photography.
sentences.cn: 路易·雅克·曼德·达盖尔（1787年11月18日——1851年7月1日）是法国美术家和化学家，因发明银版照相法而闻名。

sentences.en: The inventor of the daguerreotype is a French artist.
sentences.cn: 银版照相的发明者是位法国艺术家。
